## Loading the data


```{r, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
load("house_elections.rda")
load("candidates.rda")
load("committees.rda")
load("contributions.rda")
```


```{r}
contributions %>%
  select(transaction_type) %>%
  group_by(transaction_type) %>%
  summarise(N = n())
```
